The Camp Fire in northern #California is now the state's deadliest, with 42 fatalities and more than 200 people still unaccounted for. More than 7,500 homes and buildings have been destroyed in the #CampFire and the #WoolseyFire in southern California.

Here is a fire history map for the area where the #Woolseyfire is now burning going back to 1991. Earlier today Los Angeles County Chief Daryl Osby told reporters he believes the current fire is the largest in the area in the last 100 years.
